title: "compare_scaled_unscaled"
author: "Heather Wheeler"
date: "November 3, 2015"
output: html_document
---



```{r,fig.width=5,fig.height=5}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
"%&%" = function(a,b) paste(a,b,sep="")
my.dir <- "/Volumes/im-lab/nas40t2/hwheeler/PrediXcan_CV/GTEx_2014-06013_release/transfers/PrediXmod/DGN-WB/DGN-calc-weights/DGN-WB_weights/"
unscaled <- read.table(my.dir %&% "DGN-WB_elasticNet_alpha0.05.hapmapSnpsCEU_unscaled_weights_chr10_2015-11-01.txt",header=TRUE)
scaled <- read.table(my.dir %&% "weights_by_chr/DGN-WB_elasticNet_alpha0.05_.hapmapSnpsCEU_weights_chr10_2015-08-21.txt",header=TRUE)
dim(unscaled)
dim(scaled)
head(unscaled)
head(scaled)
tail(unscaled)
tail(scaled)
merged <- mutate(unscaled,scaledBeta=scaled[,5],unscaledBeta=beta)
ggplot(merged,aes(x=unscaledBeta,y=scaledBeta))+geom_point()+geom_abline()+coord_cartesian(xlim=c(-0.8,0.8),ylim=c(-0.8,0.8))+ggtitle("DGN chr10 alpha=0.05")
cor.test(merged$unscaledBeta,merged$scaledBeta)

unscaled <- read.table(my.dir %&% "DGN-WB_elasticNet_alpha0.95.hapmapSnpsCEU_unscaled_weights_chr10_2015-11-01.txt",header=TRUE)
scaled <- read.table(my.dir %&% "weights_by_chr/DGN-WB_elasticNet_alpha0.95_.hapmapSnpsCEU_weights_chr10_2015-08-21.txt",header=TRUE)
dim(unscaled)
dim(scaled)
head(unscaled)
head(scaled)
tail(unscaled)
tail(scaled)
merged <- mutate(unscaled,scaledBeta=scaled[,5],unscaledBeta=beta)
ggplot(merged,aes(x=unscaledBeta,y=scaledBeta))+geom_point()+geom_abline()+coord_cartesian(xlim=c(-2,2),ylim=c(-2,2))+ggtitle("DGN chr10 alpha=0.95")
cor.test(merged$unscaledBeta,merged$scaledBeta)
```
